Description: EPIPHONE SCARLET RED 33" FLYING VEE-WEE ELECTRIC GUITAR ~ S/N 0809230218 Up for auction is a red Epiphone Flying Vee-Wee electric guitar. It is appx. 33" long. The neck is appx. 14" long with 21 frets. We have plugged the guitar into an amp - it does play as expected and the nob appears to function fully. This little guitar appears to be in good condition, however there is some chipping in the finish at the edge of the V [please see close-ups], and the guitar may need to be restrung to be properly tuned. We do not have the experience or expertise to say exactly what play quality this instrument may have, therefore we are listing it as USED with LIMITED TESTING.This guitar DOES NOT come with a case.
